attributes.action: Sack parliament if they don’t follow through with people’s vote and leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: MP’s get a rediculous wage with eye watering perks. These people just milk this country to make themselves richer.
attributes.background:
We the public have made ourselves heard by way of vote. The MP’s elected by us to serve us seem to think they know better.
If the will of the people isn’t carried out when promised Parliament should be sacked immediately.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
